intro: Planera davidii, commonly known as the Chinese catalpa, is a deciduous tree native to eastern Asia. It belongs to the family Bignoniaceae and is characterized by its heart-shaped leaves and showy, trumpet-shaped flowers. The tree produces long, cylindrical pods that contain several seeds.
